statements: UPSERT INTO games (game_id, game_name, release_year, genre) VALUES (1, 'Game A', 2022, 'Action')
UPSERT INTO games (game_id, game_name, release_year, genre) VALUES (2, 'Game B', 2021, 'Adventure')
UPSERT INTO games (game_id, game_name, release_year, genre) VALUES (3, 'Game C', 2020, 'Puzzle')
UPSERT INTO players (player_id, player_name, player_level) VALUES (1, 'Alice', 10)
UPSERT INTO games (game_id, game_name, game_genre, release_year) VALUES (1, 'Game1', 'Action', 2020)
UPSERT INTO players (player_id, player_name, player_level) VALUES (2, 'Bob', 15)
UPSERT INTO players (player_id, player_name, level) VALUES (1, 'Alice', 10) ON CONFLICT (player_id) DO UPDATE SET player_name = 'Alice', level = 10;

UPSERT INTO games (game_id, game_name, release_date, genre) VALUES (1, 'Game1', '2022-01-01', 'Adventure') ON CONFLICT (game_id) DO UPDATE SET game_name = 'Game1', release_date = '2022-01-01', genre = 'Adventure';
UPSERT INTO scores (score_id, player_id, game_id, score) VALUES (1, 1, 1, 100) ON CONFLICT (score_id) DO UPDATE SET player_id = 1, game_id = 1, score = 100;

INSERT INTO Game (game_id, title, genre, release_date, platform) VALUES (1, 'Super Mario Odyssey', 'Action-Adventure', '2017-10-27', 'Nintendo Switch') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE title='Super Mario Odyssey', genre='Action-Adventure', release_date='2017-10-27', platform='Nintendo Switch';

INSERT INTO Player (player_id, player_name, email, date_of_birth, country) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '1990-05-15', 'US') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE player_name='John Doe', email='john.doe@example.com', date_of_birth='1990-05-15', country='US';
INSERT INTO Scoreboard (game_id, player_id, score, level) VALUES (1, 1, 1000, 10) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE score=1000, level=10;

UPSERT INTO Player (PlayerID, PlayerName, Age, Email, HighScore) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 25, 'john.doe@example.com', 1000) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE PlayerName = 'John Doe', Age = 25, Email = 'john.doe@example.com', HighScore = 1000;

UPSERT INTO Game (GameID, GameName, ReleaseDate, Genre, Platform) VALUES (1, 'Example Game 1', '2022-01-01', 'Action', 'PC') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE GameName = 'Example Game 1', ReleaseDate = '2022-01-01', Genre = 'Action', Platform = 'PC';
UPSERT INTO PlayerGameHistory (PlayerID, GameID, PlayTimeInHours, Score) VALUES (1, 1, 10, 500) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE PlayTimeInHours = 10, Score = 500;
